quote: Preoccupied with a single leaf, you won't see the tree. Preoccupied with a single tree, you'll miss the entire forest. Don't be preoccupied with a single spot. See everything in its entirety effortlessly. That is what it means to truly 'see'
It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
All that we are is the result of what we have thought.
Happiness does not consist in pastimes and amusements but in virtuous activities.
Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
